scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: tsc -b && vite build && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.fix:typescript: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'scripts\\fix-typescript.bat' : 'bash scripts/fix-typescript.sh', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (stdout) console.log(stdout); if (stderr) console.error(stderr); if (err) process.exit(1); })"
scripts.docker:setup: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'scripts\\docker-setup.bat' : 'bash scripts/docker-setup.sh', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (stdout) console.log(stdout); if (stderr) console.error(stderr); if (err) process.exit(1); })"
scripts.docker:shell:db: docker exec -it hotel_db psql -U hotel_user -d hotelDB
scripts.clean: rimraf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build && npm run migrate
scripts.serve:prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.ionos:setup: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform === 'win32' ? 'scripts\\ionos-setup.bat' : 'bash scripts/ionos-setup.sh', (err, stdout, stderr) => { if (stdout) console.log(stdout); if (stderr) console.error(stderr); if (err) process.exit(1); })"
